full_text: Vaccines seem to have no particular problem with B.1.1.7, a variant first identified in Britain. B.1.351, which has now been found in more than 30 countries, is of greater concern https://t.co/aDtfDOcTXV

localize.full_text: 疫苗对B.1.1.7似乎没有特别的问题，B.1.1.7是英国首次发现的变种。B.1.351目前已在30多个国家发现，但更令人关切的是https://t.co/aDtfDOcTXV。
疫苗對B.1.1.7似乎沒有特別的問題，B.1.1.7是英國首次發現的變種。B.1.351目前已在30多個國家發現，但更令人關切的是https://t.co/aDtfDOcTXV。
